law.catch_line: Effect of future amendment of this subtitle.
law.text: This subtitle or any part thereof may be modified, amended or repealed so as to effect the cancellation or authorization of any license or right of a licensee hereunder, provided that such modification, amendment or repeal shall not impair or affect the obligation of any pre-existing lawful contract between any licensee and any borrower.
law.history: Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 204, sec. 24, effective June 16, 1960.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2006). In accordance with 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 247, secs. 38 and 39, this statute has been renumbered as a section of the Kentucky Financial Services Code, KRS Chapter 286, and KRS references within this statute have been adjusted to conform with the 2006 renumbering of that code.
